::Killfest::

Killfest frowns, thinking the situation over. "I think its wisest to
do nothing right now. Going there and not helping could offend both
Zardus and the Decepticons, and we can't help one without offending
the other."

> Darkfate::
> 
> "We can't help Maximals" replied Darkfate "Decepticons are attaking

> posible allies to me... Due that I sugest send a menssager in order 
> to find out Zardus's intentions  about Trainers"
